The average points scored by SRJ per year from 2015 to 2018 is calculated as follows:

Total points: 67 + 89 + 75 + 82 = 313  
Number of years: 4  
Average = Total Points / Number of Years = 313 / 4 = 78.25

$\boxed{78.25}$
